org.openimaj.math.matrix

Class CFMatrixUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.math.matrix.CFMatrixUtils

  • public class CFMatrixUtils
extends Object
    Utility methods for dealing with the cognitive foundry Matrix.
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
